Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: Name of the metric for the record (e.g. AppsCompleted, AppsKilled, AppsFailed , etc).
Columns.Name: MetricName

Columns.Description: Value of metric in the record.
Columns.Name: MetricValue

Columns.Description: Information about the record. For example a record may be tagged with 'yarn' if it is in the yarn context.
Columns.Name: Tags

Columns.Description: Name of cluster.
Columns.Name: ClusterName

Columns.Description: Name of cluster.
Columns.Name: ClusterType

Columns.Description: Name of host where log was emitted.
Columns.Name: HostName

Columns.Description: The name of the application that the metrics describe.
Columns.Name: ApplicationName

Columns.Description: The ID of the Application that the metrics describe.
Columns.Name: ApplicationId

Columns.Description: The name of the user of the application.
Columns.Name: User

Columns.Description: The queue of the application.
Columns.Name: Queue

Columns.Description: The state of the application.
Columns.Name: State

Columns.Description: The final status of the application if it has reached a terminal state.
Columns.Name: FinalStatus

Columns.Description: The final status of the application if it has reached a terminal state.
Columns.Name: ClusterId

Columns.Description: The type of application.
Columns.Name: ApplicationType

Columns.Description: The time the application started.
Columns.Name: StartedTime

Columns.Description: The time the application finished.
Columns.Name: FinishedTime

Columns.Description: The time elapsed while the application was running.
Columns.Name: ElapsedTime

Columns.Description: The Application Master? container logs.
Columns.Name: AMContainerLogs

Columns.Description: The log aggregation status.
Columns.Name: LogAggregationStatus

Columns.Description: True if application is unmanaged, false if otherwise.
Columns.Name: UnmanagedApplication

Columns.Description: The operation associated with log record.
Columns.Name: OperationName

Columns.Description: The ID for correlated events. Can be used to identify correlated events between multiple tables.
Columns.Name: CorrelationId

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
